overview: Daniel Boone is a Kentucky Conservation Officer and father who is trying to make the best of life after the recent death of his wife. Both Boone and his daughter Jemeima are doing their best to move past the tragedy when a man he transported into federal custody escapes and his daughter is kidnapped by the same man, Tuco, who killed his wife. A modern-day retelling of the true Daniel Boone story.
title: Boone: The Vengeance Trail
